thread.title: Follow live updates from Week 7 of high school football
thread.title_full: Follow live updates from Week 7 of high school football

title: Follow live updates from Week 7 of high school football
text:
As the temperatures get colder, the football games get bigger. 
This week's slate of games features some big ones, with the biggest being Parkland against Easton. 
Lehighvalleylive is here to help you track all the games in the Lehigh Valley and northwestern New Jersey. 
Follow updates from reporters and athletic departments in the comments section at the bottom of this post to stay informed on games from across the region. 
Also, check out the high school football scoreboard where youâ€™ll find final scores and be able to get more coverage.
